profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-09-13T18:40-0400

did.abstract:
This is part of the large inventory for the Franz Boas Papers (Mss B B61). For complete information concerning this collection, please view the
Collection Description .

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Due to the size of the collection, the content for Series I has been divided into multiple inventories. Please follow the links below to browse the inventories.
